sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SMLicensingUtilWrapper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SMLicensingUtilWrapper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SMLicensingUtilWrapper = Class.create();
SMLicensingUtilWrapper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.svcLicensingUtil = new SNC.LicensingUtil();
    },

    getServersForLicensing: function() {
      return this.svcLicensingUtil.getServersForLicensing()
    },
    addServiceAssociationCondition: function(target, currentConditions, types, ref) {
       this.svcLicensingUtil.addServiceAssociationCondition(target, currentConditions, types, ref);

    },
    isNewLicenseModel: function() {
         return this.svcLicensingUtil.isNewLicenseModel();

    },
    disableCalculateNumberOfServersJob: function() {
        this.svcLicensingUtil.disableCalculateNumberOfServersJob();
    },
    type: 'SMLicensingUtilWrapper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-18 12:23:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>496452e153c6701046dfddeeff7b1242</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SMLicensingUtilWrapper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">6ca7f42c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f6a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_496452e153c6701046dfddeeff7b1242</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>pooja.chugwani</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 09:44:51</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
